content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE MovieActors;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE MovieActors (
	[MovieActorSK] int,
	[MovieActorId] nvarchar(256),
	[MovieId] nvarchar(256),
	[ActorId] nvarchar(256),
	[DataSourceId] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'MovieActors',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_southridgedatalake02_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDeltaFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.MovieActors
GO
